TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Keyboard extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于访问键盘当前状态（如当前按下了哪些键）的属性，并提供了用于将击键发送到活动窗口的方法。

span.span: Provides properties for accessing the current state of the keyboard, such as what keys are currently pressed, and provides a method to send keystrokes to the active window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard` 对象提供了计算机键盘的接口。The `My.Computer.Keyboard` object provides an interface to the computer's keyboard. `My.Computer.Keyboard` 的属性提供有关多个特殊键的状态的信息。The properties of the `My.Computer.Keyboard` provide information about the state of several special keys. 利用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` 方法，你可以将密钥发送到活动窗口，就像在键盘上键入一样。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method lets you send keys to the active window as if they have been typed at the keyboard. ## 任务Tasks 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Keyboard` 对象的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Keyboard` object. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |向应用程序发送键击Send keystrokes to an application|[如何：启动应用程序并向其发送击键 (Visual Basic)How to: Start an Application and Send it Keystrokes (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-start-an-application-and-send-it-keystrokes.md)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown` 属性来确定是否按下了计算机的 CTRL 键。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown` property to determine if the computer's CTRL key is pressed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已按下 Alt。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the ALT key is down.

value.span: 如果 ALT 键为关闭状态，则为; 否则为。否则，。

span.span: if the ALT key is down; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` 属性提供类似于 属性的功能。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` 属性来确定计算机的 ALT 键是否已关闭。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` property to determine if the computer's ALT key is down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CapsLock As Boolean
public: property bool CapsLock { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已打开 Caps Lock。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether CAPS LOCK is turned on.

value.span: 值： 是否启用 Caps Lock;否则，。

span.span: A value: if CAPS LOCK is turned on; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅返回 Caps Lock 的状态。Only the state of CAPS LOCK is returned. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.CapsLock` 属性来确定计算机的 Caps Lock 是否打开。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.CapsLock` property to determine if the computer's CAPS LOCK is turned on. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅返回 SCROLL LOCK 键的状态。Only the state of the SCROLL LOCK key is returned. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.ScrollLock` 属性来确定计算机的 SCROLL LOCK 键是否已打开。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.ScrollLock` property to determine if the computer's SCROLL LOCK key is on. summary.span: 向活动窗口发送一个或多个键击，就像在键盘键入一样。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SendKeys(string keys) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: A that defines the keys to send.

summary.span: 向活动窗口发送一个或多个键击，就像在键盘键入一样。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` 方法提供类似于 和 方法的功能。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method provides functionality similar to the and methods. 如果其他应用程序必须在应用程序继续之前完成，则 `wait` 参数非常有用。The `wait` argument is useful if the other application must finish before your application can continue. > [!NOTE] > 由于没有用于激活其他应用程序的托管方法，因此你可以在当前应用程序中使用此类，手动选择要将密钥发送到的窗口，或者使用 Windows API 方法（如 `FindWindow` 和 `SetForegroundWindow`）强制集中于其他应用程序。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application, manually select the window to send the keys to, or use Windows API methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：调用 Windows api](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Calling Windows APIs](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md). `keys` 参数可以指定任何单个键或与 ALT、CTRL 或 SHIFT （或这些键的任意组合）组合的键。The `keys` argument can specify any single key or any key combined with ALT, CTRL, or SHIFT (or any combination of those keys). 每个键由一个或多个字符表示，例如字符 "a" 的 `a` 或 ENTER 键 `{ENTER}`。Each key is represented by one or more characters, such as `a` for the character "a", or `{ENTER}` for the ENTER key. 若要将某个键与 SHIFT 组合在一起，请在键代码前面加上 `+` （加号）。To combine a key with SHIFT, precede the key code with `+` (plus sign). 若要将某个键与 CTRL 组合，请在键代码前面加上 `^` （插入符号）。To combine a key with CTRL, precede the key code with `^` (caret). 若要将某个键与 ALT 组合在一起，请在键代码前面加上 `%` （百分号）。To combine a key with ALT, precede the key code with `%` (percent sign). 若要指定重复项，请使用格式 `{`*键号*`}`。To specify repeating keys, use the form `{`*key number*`}`. 必须在*键*和*数字*之间添加一个空格。You must put a space between *key* and *number*. 例如，`{LEFT 42}` 表示 "按左箭头键42次";`{h 10}` 表示 "按" h "10 次"。For example, `{LEFT 42}` means "press the LEFT ARROW key 42 times"; `{h 10}` means "press 'h' 10 times." 下表列出了一些代码，这些代码可用于指定在按对应键（例如 ENTER 或 TAB）时不显示的字符。The following table lists the codes that can be used to specify characters that are not displayed when you press the corresponding key (such as ENTER or TAB). |KeyKey|代码Code| |-|-| |BackspaceBACKSPACE|{BACKSPACE} 或 {BS.1770}{BACKSPACE} or {BS}| |BREAKBREAK|{BREAK}{BREAK}| |Caps LockCAPS LOCK|{CAPSLOCK}{CAPSLOCK}| |清除CLEAR|清除{CLEAR}| |删除DELETE|{DELETE} 或 {DEL}{DELETE} or {DEL}| |向下键DOWN ARROW|{DOWN}{DOWN}| |EndEND|{END}{END}| |ENTER （数字键盘）ENTER (numeric keypad)|回车{ENTER}| |EnterENTER|~| |ESCESC|{ESCAPE} 或 {ESC}{ESCAPE} or {ESC}| |HELPHELP|{HELP}{HELP}| |主页HOME|{HOME}{HOME}| |INSINS|&{INSERT}| |向左键LEFT ARROW|{LEFT}{LEFT}| |Num LockNUM LOCK|{NUMLOCK}{NUMLOCK}| |PAGE DOWNPAGE DOWN|{PGDN}{PGDN}| |PAGE UPPAGE UP|{PGUP}{PGUP}| |RETURNRETURN|返回{RETURN}| |向右键RIGHT ARROW|{RIGHT}{RIGHT}| |Scroll LockSCROLL LOCK|{SCROLLLOCK}{SCROLLLOCK}| |TabTAB|{TAB}{TAB}| |向上键UP ARROW|{UP}{UP}| |F1 到 F15F1 through F15|{F1} 到 {F15}{F1} through {F15}| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` 方法将击键发送到由 方法启动的外部应用程序（记事本应用程序）。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method to send keystrokes to an external application, the Notepad application, started by the method. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#25)] 如果找不到具有请求的进程标识符的应用程序，则会引发 异常。An exception is raised if an application with the requested process identifier cannot be found. 调用 方法需要完全信任（ 类）。The call to the method requires full trust ( class).

exception.span: 存在部分信任的情况，此时用户缺少足够的权限。

span.span: A partial-trust situation exists in which the user lacks necessary permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SendKeys (string keys, bool wait);
.method public instance void SendKeys(string keys, bool wait) cil managed
Public Sub SendKeys (keys As String, wait As Boolean)
public: void SendKeys(System::String ^ keys, bool wait);

span.span: A that defines the keys to send.

param.name: wait
param.span: 一个 值，指定在应用程序继续之前是否等待键击处理完成。

span.span: A that specifies whether or not to wait for keystrokes to get processed before the application continues.

summary.span: 向活动窗口发送一个或多个键击，就像在键盘键入一样。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` 方法提供类似于 和 方法的功能。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method provides functionality similar to the and methods. 如果其他应用程序必须在应用程序继续之前完成，则 `wait` 参数非常有用。The `wait` argument is useful if the other application must finish before your application can continue. > [!NOTE] > 由于没有用于激活其他应用程序的托管方法，因此你可以在当前应用程序中使用此类，手动选择要将密钥发送到的窗口，或者使用 Windows API 方法（如 `FindWindow` 和 `SetForegroundWindow`）强制集中于其他应用程序。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application, manually select the window to send the keys to, or use Windows API methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：调用 Windows api](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Calling Windows APIs](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md). `keys` 参数可以指定任何单个键或与 ALT、CTRL 或 SHIFT （或这些键的任意组合）组合的键。The `keys` argument can specify any single key or any key combined with ALT, CTRL, or SHIFT (or any combination of those keys). 每个键由一个或多个字符表示，例如字符 "a" 的 `a` 或 ENTER 键 `{ENTER}`。Each key is represented by one or more characters, such as `a` for the character "a", or `{ENTER}` for the ENTER key. 若要将某个键与 SHIFT 组合在一起，请在键代码前面加上 `+` （加号）。To combine a key with SHIFT, precede the key code with `+` (plus sign). 若要将某个键与 CTRL 组合，请在键代码前面加上 `^` （插入符号）。To combine a key with CTRL, precede the key code with `^` (caret). 若要将某个键与 ALT 组合在一起，请在键代码前面加上 `%` （百分号）。To combine a key with ALT, precede the key code with `%` (percent sign). 若要指定重复项，请使用格式 `{`*键号*`}`。To specify repeating keys, use the form `{`*key number*`}`. 必须在*键*和*数字*之间添加一个空格。You must put a space between *key* and *number*. 例如，`{LEFT 42}` 表示 "按左箭头键42次";`{h 10}` 表示 "按" h "10 次"。For example, `{LEFT 42}` means "press the LEFT ARROW key 42 times"; `{h 10}` means "press 'h' 10 times." 下表列出了一些代码，这些代码可用于指定在按对应键（例如 ENTER 或 TAB）时不显示的字符。The following table lists the codes that can be used to specify characters that are not displayed when you press the corresponding key (such as ENTER or TAB). |KeyKey|代码Code| |-|-| |BackspaceBACKSPACE|{BACKSPACE} 或 {BS.1770}{BACKSPACE} or {BS}| |BREAKBREAK|{BREAK}{BREAK}| |Caps LockCAPS LOCK|{CAPSLOCK}{CAPSLOCK}| |清除CLEAR|清除{CLEAR}| |删除DELETE|{DELETE} 或 {DEL}{DELETE} or {DEL}| |向下键DOWN ARROW|{DOWN}{DOWN}| |EndEND|{END}{END}| |ENTER （数字键盘）ENTER (numeric keypad)|回车{ENTER}| |EnterENTER|~| |ESCESC|{ESCAPE} 或 {ESC}{ESCAPE} or {ESC}| |HELPHELP|{HELP}{HELP}| |主页HOME|{HOME}{HOME}| |INSINS|&{INSERT}| |向左键LEFT ARROW|{LEFT}{LEFT}| |Num LockNUM LOCK|{NUMLOCK}{NUMLOCK}| |PAGE DOWNPAGE DOWN|{PGDN}{PGDN}| |PAGE UPPAGE UP|{PGUP}{PGUP}| |RETURNRETURN|返回{RETURN}| |向右键RIGHT ARROW|{RIGHT}{RIGHT}| |Scroll LockSCROLL LOCK|{SCROLLLOCK}{SCROLLLOCK}| |TabTAB|{TAB}{TAB}| |向上键UP ARROW|{UP}{UP}| |F1 到 F15F1 through F15|{F1} 到 {F15}{F1} through {F15}| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` 方法将击键发送到由 方法启动的外部应用程序（记事本应用程序）。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method to send keystrokes to an external application, the Notepad application, started by the method. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#25)] 如果找不到具有请求的进程标识符的应用程序，则会引发 异常。An exception is raised if an application with the requested process identifier cannot be found. 调用 方法需要完全信任（ 类）。The call to the method requires full trust ( class).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` 属性提供类似于 属性的功能。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` 属性来确定计算机的 SHIFT 键是否已关闭。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` property to determine if one of the computer's SHIFT keys is down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#47)]
